name: Medecure
overview:
Medecure is a consumer-centric health portal. It is a platform where people can interact with renowned doctors and other community members. It is an e-clinic for the patents where they can consult the healthcare specialists for the treatment and make any kind of health-related queries.

Through Medecure, users can enjoy the benefits like: • Live chat with doctors online • Get health-related opinion from specialists • Fix online appointments

Medecure connects patients and physicians online. Patients can find a right doctor as per the disease and conditions. We provide detailed information about the physicians including his qualification, area of practice and their specialty, which increases their credibility. We give wide range of choices for doctors by specialty and conditions. On website you will find articles providing info about doctors, scoreboard to help you compare doctors and recommendations from other patients.

The medical portal facilitates the patients to find a doctor instantly. Our advance search provides listings of top doctors in India according their area of practice and specialization. Medecure provides the database of doctors in India and allows asking the health-related questions directly to them. They will find contact information and address in the doctors’ directory, which also helps the people to search for a doctor by his name, city and state. Find complete information on the treatments offered by the physicians and specialists.

People can find all kind of healthcare specialist on Medecure such as general practitioners, anesthesiologist, cosmetologist, nephrologists, dermatologist, general surgeon, pediatricians, cardiologist, diabetologist, interventional radiologist, dentists, physiotherapist, eye specialists, and gynecologists. We provide adequate information about the doctor including his qualification, area of practice and their specialty, which increases their credibility.
